revisions.rev:
'''Stallmann, Stallman''' are surname of: * {{link|de|Klaus Stallmann}} (born 1945, Bottrop), a German politician ([[Christian Democratic Union (Germany)|CDU]]) *[[Kurt Stallmann]] (born 1964), an American composer
== Stallman == * [[Lou Stallman]] ** [[Round and Round (Shapiro/Stallman song)]], a popular song by [[Joe Shapiro]] and Lou Stallman published in 1956
* [[Richard Stallman|Richard Matthew Stallman (RMS)]] (born 1953), an American computer programmer, and software freedom activist ** [[9882 Stallman]] (1994 SS9), a main-belt asteroid discovered on 1994, named after Richard Stallman
== See also == * ''{{link|nl|Stalman}}, [[Stalmans]]'' * ''{{link|de|Stahlmann}}'' * [[Stallman]] {{surname|[[Stallmann]], Stallman}}
